QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(m.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when m.encid = '' or m.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(m.encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, m.collect_date, m.collect_time, m.specimen_source, m.organism, 'oncology' source_type from {sc}.microbiology m JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND m.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(replace(m.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
